pr_title: Add description to submit and get async search, as well as cancel tasks

timeline.message:
Add description to submit and get async search, as well as cancel tasks

This makes it easier to debug where such tasks come from in case they are returned from the get tasks API.

Also renamed the last occurrence of waitForCompletion to waitForCompletionTimeout in get async search request.

timeline.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: ehm, actually, what I did is not needed for submit, because we already provide the description to createTask, which is the result of submit#toString, which holds the same info that I meant to add. So nothing to do for submit unless we want to generate the description in a lazy way like search does.
